review: Although in the adds for this product they give you the illusion that you can stream anything from your tablet to your TV. the truth is, it is limited. I mainly use it to stream youtube videos, for that it works Great.One more thing, it needs a power supply, funny again in the adds I didn't see a cable hanging out of it, but their is one other wise it wont work.The power cable is supplied and two option either connect to your TV USB port or through power out let.I tried it with two SONY TVs the older one did not work when power supplied through the TV USB so i had to plug it in to wall out let. The newer TV worked fine.Set up very easy.Youtube videos looks great when I watch it on a 45" TV rather than my tablet :)Still not happy with the stupid power cable and that its limited on stuff you can stream.
